main event: A civilian in Dayton, Ohio reported seeing an unidentified flying object on May 2, 1966 around 10:00 AM.
interesting points: The object was visible for 3-5 minutes.
The object appeared to stand still, suddenly speed up and rush away, break up into parts or explode, give off smoke, change brightness, make a sound, flash or flicker, and disappear and reappear.
The witness compared the object's brightness to a star.
The witness was not able to estimate the speed or distance of the object.
The witness reported the sighting to the U.S. Air Force as part of Project Blue Book.
